post.title: Headless Adaptive Form : Creating a Multi Language Multistep Form
post.content:
# Pre-requisites

For this session, please setup development environment as mentioned in the [last session](https://github.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/wiki/Lab-1---Beta#1-set-up-development-environment). It is expected that you have completed lab 1 before this lab session. 

More specifically, you should have your local developement setup ready and able to compelete [step 3](https://github.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/wiki/Lab-1---Beta#3-form-rendering-during-local-development) of the previous lab

Additionally, one would have to install the following artifacts to use the new features like localization, forms web sdk improvements etc

## Update Forms Headless SDK

Navigate to the `ui.frontend.react.forms.af` module inside the project created during last lab session and update the forms web sdk to the latest version (ie) `0.22.4`. re-build the project after updating the dependencies.

1. Open your terminal and navigate to the archetype project 
2. Navigate to the `ui.frontend.react.forms.af` module and run the following command

```shellSession
./node/npm install --save @aemforms/af-core@latest @aemforms/af-react-components@latest @aemforms/af-react-renderer@latest
```

After this command your `package.json` file in `ui.frontend.react.forms.af` module should have the following change

![Image](/assets/tutorial/lab2/package_json.png)


## Update Visual Studio Code Extension

Install the latest [visual code extension](https://experienceleague.adobe.com/docs/experience-manager-headless-adaptive-forms/assets/adaptive-form-builder-0.12.0.vsix?lang=en) which is **required** to localise adaptive form definition. To use the new version, uninstall the previous version and install the latest one. More details can be found [here](https://experienceleague.adobe.com/docs/experience-manager-headless-adaptive-forms/using/visual-studio-code-extension-for-headless-adaptive-forms.html)

> Note that Visual Studio Code Extension is mandatory for this lab for helping in translation of the form in multiple languages


## Enabling Local Development Server

To fetch the form model definition from local development server without using AEM, we would need to update the environment variables and web pack configuration.  

> Note that this is only for development process, the final JSON needs to be present in the AEM for Form Functionality like submit, workflow to work

### Update dependences for the frontend project

Navigate to the `ui.frontend.react.forms.af` module in the archetype project created in lab 1 and run the commands mentioned below

```shellSession
./node/npm install --save-dev copy-webpack-plugin \
--save react-router-dom react-router
```

The command installs the web pack plugin and react router related dependencies (for localisation)

### Update the frontend code 

To enable faster development/preview of the Form, we have made changes to the archetype project which will be available in the next release. Until then please copy paste the changes manually as mentioned below

In the `ui.frontend.react.forms.af` module of the archetype project, save the files below

* [webpack.common.js](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/lab2/ui.frontend.react.forms.af/webpack.common.js),
* [webpack.dev.js](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/lab2/ui.frontend.react.forms.af/webpack.dev.js), 
* [webpack.prod.js](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/lab2/ui.frontend.react.forms.af/webpack.prod.js), 
* [.env](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/lab2/ui.frontend.react.forms.af/.env), 
* [.env.development](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/lab2/ui.frontend.react.forms.af/.env.development) 

> If you have wget installed you can run the following commands in the terminal after navigating to the `ui.frontend.react.forms.af` directory
> ```shellSession
> wget -N https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/lab2/ui.frontend.react.forms.af/webpack.common.js
> wget -N https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/lab2/ui.frontend.react.forms.af/webpack.dev.js
> wget -N https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/lab2/ui.frontend.react.forms.af/webpack.prod.js
> wget -N https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/lab2/ui.frontend.react.forms.af/.env
> wget -N https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/lab2/ui.frontend.react.forms.af/.env.development
> ```


Update the following file in the `src` directory of the `ui.frontend.react.forms.af` module 
* [Form.tsx](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/lab2/ui.frontend.react.forms.af/src/Form.tsx) 
* [index.tsx](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/lab2/ui.frontend.react.forms.af/src/index.tsx) 
* [FormWithLanguageRoute.tsx ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/lab2/ui.frontend.react.forms.af/src/FormWithLanguageRoute.tsx)

> Again if you have wget installed, you can run the following commands in the `src` directory of the `ui.frontend.react.forms.af` module
> ```shellSession
> wget -N https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/lab2/ui.frontend.react.forms.af/src/Form.tsx
> wget -N https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/lab2/ui.frontend.react.forms.af/src/index.tsx
> wget -N https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adobe/aem-forms-af-runtime/lab2/ui.frontend.react.forms.af/src/FormWithLanguageRoute.tsx
> ```
